attributes.action: The PM to attend the monarch, end lockdown and their government in entirety
attributes.additional_details: The PM to attend the monarch--end lockdown & their government in entirety whilst restoring to the people their rights and liberty. The PM to end all interventions imposed--known and unknown on the people by the crown’s servants and agents in the name of SARS-CoV-2 -Pathogen, the Covid-19 illness  66|0007|167
